about_the_game:
Fuse Cards to Power Up!

Turn the tides of battle by fusing cards together! Experiment with different combinations of card fusions to unlock each card's full potential. But be wary - sometimes, the situation may call for playing two cards on their own, rather than fusing them. The choice is yours!

Build Decks with Unique Synergies!

With four archetypes to choose from at the start of each run, explore different strategies to get the most out of each card in your deck. Draft new cards into your deck as you progress through the map, and discover potent synergies that would send the fiercest foes running.

Choose Your Own Path!

As you navigate the realm of Erdia, make important choices every step of the way on your path to vanquish darkness from this realm. No two adventures will be the same.

Each Adventure is a New Beginning

  • 30+ cards with 4 different archetypes to choose from
  • 30+ possible fusion cards to boost your power
  • Challenging monsters with varied combat styles
  • Path choices that could either help or hinder your journey
  • Rune augments to augment your power both in and out of battle
  • Many more cards, fusions, and enemies are still on the way!

name: Hand of Anima Demo
short_description: Fuse cards together in this roguelike deckbuilder to unleash their full potential. Discover powerful fusion combinations, craft unique decks, harness the power of ancient runes, and conquer challenging enemies on your quest to restore peace to the realm of Erdia.
